title: Rune pages not saving
body: So I recently have been having the issue that when i do my rune page it says not connected then connects to pvp client. But it doesnt save my rune page at all. I have 2 previously set ones that I am working with at the momment. Please let me know if anyone else is having that problem or if its just me. I would really like some help in fixing this

replies.body:
I feel the core cause of your issue is your unstable connection to the PvP.net service. This is likely directly caused or at least greatly exacerbated by certain network settings that could conflict with League. The most common solutions for this can be found inside our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I strongly recommend starting there.

Let me know if this helped.
